item.description:
The trail to the pond and around the pond is about 3 miles, easy going.
At a leasurely pace, complete with throwing sticks and talking, it can be completed in about 2 hours without breaking a sweat.

The area is only accessible by foot or bicycle - gifting visitors with a near serene nature experience.


DIRECTIONS:
Route 101 East
Exit 2
Right on Hooksett Road
1/4 mile up take a Left onto Old Candia Road ?- drive by Smiley Veterinarian on Left hand side
1/4 mile another left under Route 101 OVERPASS ?? there's a house on the corner of this DIRT road

There are 3 places to park, drive to the 3rd one; about 1/2 mile up the road
Look for my car: Light Green Volvo Station Wagon; License plate eprint
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a Green Volvo NH license plate of EPRINT

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Tower Hill Pond Dam - Auburn, NH
